text: Boké is a region in the west of Guinea. It is bordered by the countries of Senegal and Guinea-Bissau and the Guinean regions of Kindia and Labé. The regional capital is the city of Boké. As of the 2014 census, 1,083,147 people lived there. It has an area of . == Prefectures == * Boffa Prefecture * Boké Prefecture * Fria Prefecture * Gaoual Prefecture * Koundara Prefecture Category:Regions of Guinea
title: Boké Region
